entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add support for skipping visibility checks with AssemblyBuilder.DefineDynamicAssembly #85020
  • Random.NextSingle returns 1.0 #85016
  • [Analyzer suggestion]: Avoid recursive iterators #85015
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce an intrinsic for more efficient lambda generation #85014
  • [wasm] `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml`, and `System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.ReflectionOnly` tests breaking for AOT on rolling builds #85013
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] `System.Collections.Immutable.Tests`+AOT failing on rolling builds #85012
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Blazor/AOT tests failing because `Microsoft.JSInterop.WebAssembly` is not getting skipped for AOT #85010
    8.0.0
  • TypeLoadException when attempting to create an instance of a struct of particular type #84999
  • JSSignatureContext.cs may include incorrect use of Math.Abs #84996
  • Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers #84995
    8.0.0
  • Issues understanding a StackOverflowException from System.Diagnostics.Process.AsyncStreamReader #84993
  • BigInteger has a buggy assert #84991
  • Bad CodeAnalysis warning and inaccessible DynamicallyAccessedMembersAttribute to fix it #84990
  • [API Proposal]: HttpClient/HttpMessageInvoker metrics #84978
    8.0.0
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs #84974
  • `DeflateStream/GZipStream/BrotliStream .BaseStream` when instance is disposed #84973
  • System.PlatformNotSupportedException: Algorithm 'RC2' is not supported on this platform. #85019
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regressions in Utf8Formatter #84989
  • [Perf] Alpine/x64: 7 Regressions on 4/6/2023 3:49:07 PM #84988
  • [API Proposal]: Compiled framework-dependent `.exe` should automatically download and install appropriate runtime #84969
  • Coredistools failure to disassemble vextracti64x4 #84967
    8.0.0
  • [JitStress] JIT/IL_Conformance/Old/Conformance_Base/bge_un* failures #84966
  • Re-open #43410: Subsequent calls to ConfigureAppConfiguration cannot see previously added Providers #84958
  • Uri.Query should not start with a question mark #84955

Closed

  • Intermittent failure in JIT/Directed/coverage/oldtests/tlstest_il_r/tlstest.dll #84818
    8.0.0
  • NullReferenceException in System.IO.Compression.Deflater.DeallocateInputBufferHandle() during finalization #84994
  • [6.0][windows][mono] HttpRequestException : Unknown error 0xffffffff 127.0.0.1:RandomPort #84175
  • [Fuzzlyn] Arm64 failure for negation, cast, bitwise-and #84693
    8.0.0
  • .NET Debugging services don't issue thread create callbacks for single file apps #77574
    8.0.0
  • Missed optimization with `Math.Abs`; Branches generated on x86 #84986
  • [MONO][TEST] Bring up iOS/arm64 and iOSSimulator arm64 Runtime tests in CI #81233
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Eventpipe Runtime Test Failures on iOS Simulator #74891
    8.0.0
  • [cecil] Enable source-build pre-built detection #84985
  • nativeaot/SmokeTests/DwarfDump failing on linux-x64 Debug #84979
  • Linux musl x64 build break apparently due to some libc version mismatch (high priority as it is blocking clean CI) #84949
  • `RuntimeInformation.OSDescription` is really `KernelDescription` #83287
  • [NativeAOT] Environment.GetCommandLineArgs() throws nullref exception #84944
  • Reflection regression - Type.GetType does not skip leading `.` #84644
  • [JitStress pipeline] Runtime_72363 is failing #84961
  • Tracking issue for CI build failure "agent ran longer than the maximum time of 180 minutes" #82084
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused helix queue definitions #85018
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Report -1 for GC.GetGeneration(nongc_obj) and same for GetObjectGeneration #85017
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Improve mono_print_ins (). #85011
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] WBT: Re-enable previously disabled test #85009
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Reduce the number of hwintrinsic tests by removing no longer interesting scenarios #85008
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Increase the opcode value for opcodes where the jiterpreter is able to unroll sets and moves #85007
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Fix illumos-x64 build #85006
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid null ref in JsonSeparatorNamingPolicy #85002
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Enable ComWrappers for NativeAOT on non-Windows #85000
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add binary parsing support to integer types #84998
    new-api-needs-documentation, needs-area-label
  • add nixos ping executable path #84997
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 7 #84984
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add Ubuntu 22.10 kinetic kudu RIDs for .NET 6 #84983
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Add documentation for merge on red, build analysis, and v1/v2 tests #84982
    documentation, needs-author-action, needs-area-label, 8.0.0
  • [browser] JSObject thread affinity assertions #84981
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser] Enable webcil in Wasm SDK #84977
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Add TargetHostName to QuicConnection #84976
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • This fixes an issue with gradual decommit in scenarios where we have … #84975
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JsonConsoleFormatter: keep escaped line breaks for Exceptions #83726 #84972
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Improve DateTime{Offset} formatting further in a variety of cases #84963
    needs-area-label
  • Update ECMA-335 for function pointer changes #84962
    area-Meta
  • [LoongArch64] revert the modification about the LA64's PageSize by #83632. #84960
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [workloads] Bump .NET 7 Package Version #84956
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Disable TLS field access for Arm #84954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid unnecessary array allocation in DateTimeParse #84964
    area-System.Globalization
  • Don't contain operands for intrinsics when generating a jmp table fallback #84933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add config binder generator to ASP.NET Core transport pack #84436
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Revert Deflater/Inflater changes around SafeHandle initialization #85001
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Fix running tests against our DNNE'd NativeExports project to work in NativeAOT #84578
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/6.0] Disable 2 failing tests for 6.0 #84726
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix setting managed breakpoints in singlefile apps with direct-mapped R2R sections #84965
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM32/ARM64 - Fixed zero/sign-extension for `GT_STORE_LCL_VAR` in codegen #84716
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose AVX512 variants of SSE-SSE4.2 instructions #84909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Split PortableThreadPool.WorkerThread start and loop body #84490
    area-System.Threading
  • Start running Loader and Interop tests for NativeAOT #84404
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Publish Aggregated Values For `Counter` and `UpDownCounter` For System.Diagnostics.Metrics #84846
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Fix OperatingSystemTest.TestIsOSPlatform_MacCatalyst #84842
    needs-area-label
  • [browser] Minimal blazor.boot.json integration #84296
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Bump expected Dwarf warning count #84980
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix R2R test build #84952
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add binary support to number formatting #84889
    area-System.Runtime
  • Split the MergedTestWrapper for the HWIntrinsic tests so we can actually filter per platform #84959
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the compiling errors for aligned and definiations. #84971
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] fix the CMakeLists which destroyed by RISCV #82381. #84970
    area-VM-coreclr, arch-loongarch64
  • OSDescription.Linux: return a user-friendly name based on /etc/os-release. #83976
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` SortKey #84621
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Fix Environment.GetCommandLineArg for AOT compiled libraries #84953
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix Type.GetType for global type names with leading '.' #84957
    area-System.Reflection
  • [RISC-V] Disable corelib crossgen2 #84781
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Adjust managed type system for new function pointer handling #84819
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [wasm-mt] A version of LowLevelLifoSemaphore that uses callbacks on the browser #84491
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Private API for RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [JIT] experiment - Ignore PHI nodes for `IfConversion` phase #83625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address a couple `TODO-ADDR`s #84906
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Enable event pipe test in NativeAOT CI run #84891
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lowering Vector512() methods : comparison + shift #84942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Acclerate `Vector512` multiply and divide. #84941
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Accelerate Vector512 `ConvertToSingle` and `ConvertToInt32`. #84932
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Enable CS1591 for projects that don't use intellisense package XML file #84917
    bug, area-Infrastructure-libraries, blocking-release, 8.0.0
  • Updating XML doc comments for hardware intrinsics to include VEX and EVEX forms #84892
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, arch-avx512
  • Use `gtNewIndir` in more places #84528
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avx512: Abs, ceil, floor, min, max #84937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Combine 'neg' and 'cmp' to 'cmn' #84667
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • WIP: Optimize `ComputeLastIndex` #83441
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Fix instuctions for nativeaot build #84919
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, needs-author-action
  • Obsolete some protected, unused members of Regex{Runner} #84812
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Fix some issues with null check handling #84523
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] Caching settings.pause_mode to avoid deadlock #84738
    Servicing-consider, area-GC-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Attempt to fix #84636 #84871
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • The ConstructorBuilder and MethodBuilder generated parameter should not has default value by default #84550
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Try to untangle the rid calculation. #82832
    community-contribution
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix unrollings on AVX1-only machines #84946
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use cinv instead of csel when possible #84926
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V][JIT] JIT/CodeGenBringUpTest #84748
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] add internal WebWorkerEventLoop utility class #84492
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [browser] Make JSExport worker thread friendlier #83680
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Change the stresslog message layout to support extra-large modules and modules loaded at far-apart addresses that use the stresslog #83855
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [wasm-mt] Support async JS interop on threadpool threads #84494
    area-Threading-mono
  • Don't re-instrument methods which don't need that #84772
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix async XsdValidatingReader to not use synchronious IO #84888
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • [browser] cleanup of early startup code #83411
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Backport #78136 to .NET 7 #84936
    Servicing-approved, tenet-performance, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, source-generator, 7.0.7
  • Fix HTTP3 header decoder buffer allocation #78862
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add a dedicated Ascii.IsValid path #84881
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Making sure we have at least one region per gen during plan phase #83076
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [browser] fix trimming of `LegacyExports` with `WasmEnableLegacyJsInterop` #83664
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` checking for prefix/suffix #84920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` indexing #84471
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Delete `GT_STORE_OBJ` #84951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Annotate Microsoft.CSharp library code for DynamicCode #82747
    area-Microsoft.CSharp, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Extend PreInitialization Support to readonly GC fields #84431
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Various fixes for consecutive registers found with jitstressregs #84824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Add message details for AmbiguousMatchException #84512
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • AssemblyBuilder.Save add custom attributes handling. #84580
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Specify -z notext on linux-musl-x86 #83682
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
